publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3005 Michael Russell: Queen of the South Football Club Promotion to Divison One—That the Parliament congratulates Queen of the South Football Club, its players, management, board of directors and loyal fans, for their success in securing promotion to the Scottish First Division, a feat which has escaped them for the last 16 years; is certain that this achievement will help to secure the club’s future; looks forward to further success for the club, and commends the contribution made by the manager, John Connolly, who has in two years transformed a football club in financial difficulty and facing relegation into one which is now on the way up and which also has continued ambition to go on climbing.

S1M-3005 Michael Russell: Queen of the South Football Club Promotion to Division One-That the Parliament congratulates Queen of the South Football Club, its players, management, board of directors and loyal fans, for their success in securing promotion to the Scottish First Division, a feat which has escaped them for the last 16 years; is certain that this achievement will help to secure the club's future; looks forward to further success for the club, and commends the contribution made by the manager, John Connolly, who has in two years transformed a football club in financial difficulty and facing relegation into one which is now on the way up and which also has continued ambition to go on climbing. Supported by: Christine Grahame*
S1M-3005 Queen of the South Football Club Promotion to Division One (lodged on 18 April 2002) Bruce Crawford*, Mr David Davidson*
S1M-3005 Queen of the South Football Club Promotion to Division One (lodged on 18 April 2002) Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-3005 Queen of the South Football Club Promotion to Division One (lodged on 18 April 2002) Ian Jenkins*
S1M-3005 Queen of the South Football Club Promotion to Division One (lodged on 18 April 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3005 Queen of the South Football Club Promotion to Division One (lodged on 18 April 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*
